name: Goblin Pilot
description: Take it off! Of course, only goblin can drive the goblin helicopter. Adventurers can only watch it.

name: Goblin Pilot Blueprint
description: Take it off! Of course, only goblin can drive the goblin helicopter. Adventurers can only watch it.

name: Goblin Treasure
description: Actually, Goblin does not treat these stuffs as valuable, but they must call them "treasure" in order to deeply communicate with mankind.

name: Gods' Gaze 2 [2]
description: This staff, made from the powers of the oldest Divine Trees of the dark jungle, looks like an ordinary wooden stick but it actually contains abundant amounts of magical energy.

name: Gods' Gaze 3 [2]
description: This staff, made from the powers of the oldest Divine Trees of the dark jungle, looks like an ordinary wooden stick but it actually contains abundant amounts of magical energy.

name: Gods' Gaze Shard
description: Shard of the legendary artifact: Gods' Gaze. By collecting rare materials and more debris, with ancient knowledge and legendary Mr. Dragon's skills, you may restore it to the original form.

name: Gods' Gaze [2]
description: This staff, made from the powers of the oldest Divine Trees of the dark jungle, looks like an ordinary wooden stick but it actually contains abundant amounts of magical energy.

name: God’s Coin
description: Gained from GVG final battles. Guild leader and vice leader can redeem crafting material of Headwear Artifacts in GVG Headwear Artifact store!

name: Goibne's Armor
description: Craftsman Goibne drinks immortal wine when he works, the wine once accidentally dropped on the armor and endowed the armor with special force.

name: Goibne's Armor [1]
description: Craftsman Goibne drinks immortal wine when he works, the wine once accidentally dropped on the armor and endowed the armor with special force.

name: Goibne's Greaves
description: The boots made by Goibne to bet against his rival, Duff.

name: Goibne's Greaves [1]
description: The boots made by Goibne to bet against his rival, Duff.

name: Goibne's Helm
description: It one of the few armors made by Goibne who mainly built weapons. Gods gave more praise to Goibne's armors than his weapons.

name: Goibne's Helm [1]
description: It one of the few armors made by Goibne who mainly built weapons. Gods gave more praise to Goibne's armors than his weapons.

name: Goibne's Helm [1] Blueprint
description: It one of the few armors made by Goibne who mainly built weapons. Gods gave more praise to Goibne's armors than his weapons.

name: Goibne's Spaulders
description: Goibne's first armor, it's said that Goibne cherished it very much.

name: Goibne's Spaulders [1]
description: Goibne's first armor, it's said that Goibne cherished it very much.

name: Gold Angel
description: The angel made of gold, which symbolizes the guarding will of the wearer. The back side is engraved with words "guard the temple glory with our lives".
